Author: S3cco
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Bitcoin Garden: Globitex Exchange Leads Charge in Trading by Lowering and Removing Fees https://bitcoingarden.org/globitex-exchange-leads-charge-in-trading-by-lowering-and-removing-fees/  As part of its new strategy to become the most widely used cryptocurrency exchange, Globitex is lowering and removing fees for certain account features. Globitex aims to make it’s products more accessible for retail and corporate customers. The EURO Wallet continues to excel as the best solution for sending and receiving EUR payments from inside of an exchange. The EURO Wallet is powered by Nexpay UAB, an EU licensed financial institution and gives users full control of their assets.  “We implement changes quickly around feedback we gather from both retail and corporate customers. We never compromise on security, we abide by every regulation to ensure customers get the most of what is possible with cryptocurrencies today.” – Uldis Teraudkalns CEO of Globitex Exchange.  Private Individuals will enjoy the removal of the monthly account maintenance fee, this allows Globitex clients to open and maintain a EURO Wallet account without cost or liability until it is actually used for transactions.  Corporate customers will enjoy the reduced net cost on larger transactions, making the service more attractive for the largest corporate clients and traders. The combination of the service offering and pricing makes Globitex the No.1 cross crypto-fiat trading and financial operations platform. Globitex aims to add the functionality of using GBX tokens to pay for EURO Wallet fees with discounts, which will substantially increase the utility of the GBX token in the upcoming weeks....

Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: I agree that it is early and hopefully they surprise me. I have however invested also in other (competitive) projects at the same time. And these exchanges are either in the beta testing or going now live (tokens.net, Blockport...) - their development can be seen. The competition is fierce and half a year is a lot in crypto.  Globitex already has an exchange (luckily), which they had even before the ICO. However nothing (or not much) positive has happened afterwards. We are in a standstill position which can be devastating, especially in crypto world.

Author: Perunex
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Tokens are finally distributed. However, locked atm and not transferable which means de facto that they are un-buyable/un-sellable. The steps are made, though. Here is the quoted message received via e-mail:  "Please note that due to a pending technical issue with MyEtherWallet provider, involving decimal unit display, the transactions are disabled for the GBX token. This means, temporarily, you cannot send the tokens to other ethereum addresses, or receive tokens from other token holders. We are presently waiting for the issue to be cleared on the MEW team’s part. Once the latest update is pushed out, estimated on Monday 9 Apr 2018, you will receive an email confirmation from us.  Meanwhile, you can see your tokens without any issue on all other wallets, except MEW. If your tokens are not loading automatically, please find attached an explanation how to add the GBX tokens to your wallet manually. "

Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: New announcement:  Issue with MEW has been solved. Now we can see the tokens and send them freely: "With this update, the outstanding issue with one important Ethereum wallet provider has been solved. Your purchased GBX tokens are now available to you on your indicated Ethereum Wallet(s). Please also be kindly informed that the GBX tokens are now available to you only on your Ethereum Wallet. You can now send the tokens to other Ethereum addresses, or receive more tokens from other token holders privately.  Secondly, listing of the GBX is planned on their exchange. Author: filsid
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: How to Participate in the Globitex GBX Token Sale  The Globitex GBX Token Sale officially launches on February 10, 2018 at 17:00 UTC.  Participation: Sign up at www.globitexico.com on February 10 at 17:00 UTC and follow the step-by-step guide under the “How To Contribute to the Globitex GBX Token Sale” section below. There is no whitelist or KYC in advance.  Wallets: You will need a wallet service or an application where you and only you hold the private keys. Private keys are needed to correctly interact with smart contract functions, such as transferring tokens. Your Wallet must support the Ethereum EIP20 (formerly known as ERC-20) token standard in order to receive Globitex GBX Tokens. It must be a non-exchange wallet.  Browsers: There are no restrictions on browsers during the token sale.  Distribution: All Globitex GBX tokens sold during the private pre-sale and public sale will be created and distributed up to one month after the official end of the main token sale on March 19, 2018 at 17:00 UTC or when the hard cap of EUR 10,000,000 is reached, whichever event comes first. There will be no unsold tokens. Tokens will be sent to the address where payment was made from or address provided as Globitex GBX token receiving address (i.e. the participant’s ERC-20, non-exchange wallet).  https://medium.com/@globitex/how-to-participate-in-the-globitex-gbx-token-sale-70caf4bcf80e

Author: pro-trader
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: There is an explanation from Globitex now on the reddit post, see copied in below. I am not writing a lot in this forum. If somebody demands a professional institutional level exchanger, then it would be me! Just read my older posts on this. So I was watching this one closely.  But this Globitex will definetly be nothing for me.  Here is the reply from Globitex in the above mentioned reddit:  Hello @bikersail, This is Liza Aizupiete, Co-Founder and Managing Director of Globitex. Thank you for reminding me and the team to take down the old website we have had since 2009. This business is no longer in existence, hence there is no reason to keep the site up. For clarification, MTG Capital has no relation with the other MTG Capital Group or MTG Capital Associates or any other MTG firm. Ours was a proprietary trading and asset management company. Most of the Globitex team were involved in this business, which has shaped our relations as colleagues. Mr P Storm is not part of the team, completely unrelated to Globitex. With regards to your other remarks, please note that the whole team of Globitex has gone through a thorough European regulatory scrutiny. As a licenced group company, our credentials as a team and individually have been thoroughly verified.

Author: Globitex
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Maker/taker fees offer a transaction rebate in the form of lower/no commissions to those who provide liquidity on the exchange (the market makers). The chief aim of maker/taker fees is to stimulate trading activity within the exchange.  In simple terms, if you place a limit order to buy at a price lower or  sell at a price higher than the current market rate of an asset, you can expect to pay lower/no fees compared to someone that just places a market order and immediately buys/sells at the current available rates.  Hope this helps.

Author: Globitex
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Due to the impending Bitcoin fork event scheduled around 16 November 2017, which is a significant event for the community, Globitex have taken the decision to postpone the public token sale event of GBX tokens, originally planned for 8 November 2017.  The revised date for the public token sale will be announced shortly, so please check back for further updates or join the Telegram channel to hear the news first. Meanwhile GBX tokens will continue to be available via an ongoing pre sale for contributors of EUR 10,000 equivalent or more.  The Globitex exchange is already operating real euro, bitcoin and bitcoin cash exchange platform albeit in limited Beta mode. It is therefore important to ensure that the project has the best possible start. Postponing the public sale of GBX until after the fork will ensure a safe, secure and transparent token sale process for all.  Globitex

Author: tokenmarket
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Dear Bounty Campaigners,  Just a quick announcement to confirm we at Token Market are continuing Globitex's campaign. Any announcements to say otherwise are false, we look forward to everyone continuing their support to this bounty with us.  Regards  Token Market

Author: tokenmarket
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Due to the impending Bitcoin fork event scheduled around 16 November 2017, which is a significant event for the community, Globitex have taken the decision to postpone the public token sale event of GBX tokens, originally planned for 8 November 2017.  The revised date for the public token sale will be announced shortly, so please check back for further updates or join the Telegram channel to hear the news first. Meanwhile GBX tokens will continue to be available via an ongoing pre sale for contributors of EUR 10,000 equivalent or more.  The Globitex exchange is already operating real euro, bitcoin and bitcoin cash exchange platform albeit in limited Beta mode. It is therefore important to ensure that the project has the best possible start. Postponing the public sale of GBX until after the fork will ensure a safe, secure and transparent token sale process for all.  Please keep continuing with your bounties, this ICO will go ahead soon.  Thank you for your continued support,  Token Market

Author: Globitex
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Globitex is currently in public BETA, offering XBTEUR (Euro against bitcoin) and XBTBCH (euro against bitcoin cash) pairs, both commission free.  We will start charging commissions when BETA phase ends, and we launch fully. Right now, it's free trading, so welcome to it!

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Globitex Launch Token Sale for Spot and Derivatives Exchange in Bitcoin  The project, which is co-founded by former Executive Director and Founding Board Member of the Bitcoin Foundation Jon Matonis, aims to scale Bitcoin economically in order to become a truly useful currency of global trade and settlement.  Institutional Bitcoin exchange Globitex, which is currently in limited beta, is holding a token sale to scale up operations with the aim of making Bitcoin a truly global currency. The exchange already offers institutional level FIX API for direct market access for algorithmic traders, paving the way for the virtual currency to become a universal medium of exchange across the full breadth of the international financial and commodity markets.  Bitcoin’s biggest problem: liquidity  Whilst the Bitcoin protocol has been undergoing concrete steps for Bitcoin’s technical scaling, Globitex’s founders recognise the chief issue holding back its wider use is liquidity. Bitcoin is still relatively thinly traded, with low volumes by conventional market standards. Despite being the ideal currency for international settlement across the spectrum of the financial and commodities markets, it cannot serve this purpose without a step-change in market depth and trading volumes.  https://coinidol.com/globitex-launch-token-sale/

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Globitex: Commission-free Bitcoin Cash trading and token sale  The institutional-grade Bitcoin exchange, co-founded by an early Bitcoin adopter Jon Matonis, has announced their token sale project to facilitate a step-change in trading volumes and liquidity.  Globitex, a Bitcoin exchange with advanced API functionality, is scaling to accelerate Bitcoin development into a truly global currency, and will accept Bitcoin (XBT), Ethereum (ETH) and Bitcoin Cash (BCH) for its forthcoming token sale.  Free trade for BCH and XBT  Following the hardfork of the Bitcoin Blockchain at 12:20:00 UTC on 1 August 2017, a new Bitcoin-based Blockchain known as Bitcoin Cash (BCH) was created. Balances on the existing Bitcoin (XBT) Blockchain were duplicated on the BCH chain. In the following weeks, Bitcoin Cash has gained significant miner support and user interest, and is therefore also being supported by cryptocurrency exchanges.  https://coinidol.com/globitex-commission-free-bitcoin-cash-trading/

Author: Globitex
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Our purpose is to advance the Bitcoin industry globally, increase Bitcoin trading liquidity and allow professional traders to participate via API (FIX & RESTful) interface for trading and payments. Globitex is a centralised service provider, ensuring entry and exit to and from fiat money.

Author: Globitex
Title: ANN [GBX] Globitex - Linking Digital Currency to Global Trade
Body: Globitex was originally launched as a Bitcoin-Euro (XBTEUR) exchange. Since this weeks Tuesday, we have enabled Euro-Bitcoin Cash pair.  The liquidity of this pairing is quite thin at the moment.  If you are trading these pairs, why not to do it commision free? https://globitex.com/signup/
